Text.Page:
Day 1: Lockheart's Daughter

Victim: Annalie Lockheart
Race: High Elf
Status: Dead

Incident Report #2005933
Annalie Lockheart's body was found this morning on a path along the river, outside Bastion. She was stabbed 14 times with a small, bladed weapon, 5 times in the front and 9 in the back.

Today is--was her 18th birthday, and we have no idea who could have done this.

The victim was last seen leaving a diplomatic event hosted by federation Magister Ivory the night before, by a young popori by the name of "Chip" Mcguffins. He claims to have seen her in conversation with Ivory, but no other witnesses can confirm his statement.View the Evidence

Exhibit #2005933a. A handwritten note from Dugger to Annalie, found in her hand by Officer Doopes.

Hey you,

Ditch the party! I'm in the garden. The game's over and I want to party in Lumbertown. You in?

DuggerDay 3
